items.name: 此身为剑
items.nameEn: I Shall Be My Own Sword

items.name: 决心如汗珠般闪耀
items.nameEn: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat

items.name: 愿虹光永驻天空
items.nameEn: Long May Rainbows Adorn the Sky

items.name: 余生的第一天
items.nameEn: Day One of My New Life

items.name: 生命当付之一炬
items.nameEn: Life Should Be Cast to Flames

items.name: 血火啊，燃烧前路
items.nameEn: Flame of Blood, Blaze My Path
